subject: Hoaxes
Documentary Films and Programs
Movies
Social Networking (Internet)
Television
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame has said Manti Te’o was the victim of a kind of hoax known as catfishing, which is the basis of a documentary film and an MTV show.
